document.heading: Vital Records Act of 1981 Amendment Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-168, the “Vital Records Act of 1981 Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-450, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 12, 1990, and June 26, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 12, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-233 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
